verbose_text: Recently, a more eco-friendly oxidase catalyzed deracemization method by imine reductase and an artificial transfer hydrogenase as a reductant in substitution for the chemical reductant was reported.12a,12 b However, these non chemical reductants have limits in the selection of the substrate; for example, only cyclic amines, which generate stable imine under the aqueous buffer by AOD, can be used as substrates.
evidence: oxidase-catalyzed deracemization method by imine reductase and an artificial transfer hydrogenase
